name: Fuga Nox
description:
Fuga Nox is 2D platformer that encourages you to find the quickest route!
Complete levels as fast as possible and keep your score low...

Fuga Nox was created for a university project and is the first game completely developed and created by me, it is still a work in progress and will be worked on in the future! Any reviews would be greatly appreciated, thank you for all your support.

Features:
  • Enemies and traps
  • Moving platforms
  • Item effects
  • Different paths

The story should be added in the next update!
